Field.Name: SimulationMode
Field.Description: Machine running in simulation mode with no workpiece involved.

Field.Name: TestMode
Field.Description: Machine running in test mode with a workpiece involved.

Field.Name: ProductionMode
Field.Description: Machine running in production mode.

uax:Description.uax:Text: Machine running in simulation mode with no workpiece involved.
Machine running in test mode with a workpiece involved.

Field.Name: Unknown
Field.Description: Unknown state. Used when result is not known, e.g. because job order is still running.

Field.Name: Successful
Field.Description: Job order was executed successful

Field.Name: Unsuccessful
Field.Description: Job order was not executed successful.

uax:Description.uax:Text: Unknown state. Used when result is not known, e.g. because job order is still running.
Job order was not executed successful.

Field.Name: CapabilityUnavailable
Field.Description: The machine is not able to give a statement about process irregularities.

Field.Name: Detected
Field.Description: A process irregularity has been detected.

Field.Name: NotDetected
Field.Description: There was no process irregularity detected.

Field.Name: NotYetDetermined
Field.Description: A statement about the process irregularity is to be expected.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The machine is not able to give a statement about process irregularities.
A process irregularity has been detected.
There was no process irregularity detected.
A statement about the process irregularity is to be expected.

Field.Name: OrderNumber
Field.Description: Identifier identifies the order (order identifier).

Field.Name: LotNumber
Field.Description: Identifier identifies the production group of the item (lot identifier).

Field.Name: SerialNumber
Field.Description: Identifier identifies the one entity of the item (product identifier).

Field.Name: Identification
Field.Description: Identification of the output.

Field.Name: Quantity
Field.Description: Quantity defines the amount of material. This quantity can be specified in different ways, e.g. weight or number.

Field.Name: EngineeringUnits
Field.Description: The engineering unit of the quantity.

Field.Name: Identification
Field.Description: Identification of the output.

Field.Name: ComponentInformation
Field.Description: Contains information about components.

Field.Name: ItemNumber
Field.Description: ItemNumber defines an Identifier to identify the Type of the item (Material Identifier).

Field.Name: OutputInfo
Field.Description: Bitmask indicating which of the optional fields are used for identification. If none is selected, only ItemNumber is used. Each selected optional field shall provide a value.

Field.Name: OrderNumber
Field.Description: OrderNumber defines an Identifier to identify the order. Shall be provided if defined in OutputInfo.

Field.Name: LotNumber
Field.Description: LotNumber defines an Identifier to identify the production-group of the item (Lot Identifier). Shall be provided if defined in OutputInfo.

Field.Name: SerialNumber
Field.Description: SerialNumber defines an Identifier to identify the one entity of the item (Product Identifier). Shall be provided if defined in OutputInfo.

Field.Name: Identification
Field.Description: Identification of the output.

Field.Name: StartTime
Field.Description: Output of first item from order.

Field.Name: EndTime
Field.Description: Output of last item from order.

Field.Name: Parameters
Field.Description: Parameters specific to the performance like pressure or temperature.

UAVariable.Description: Collects the data type descriptions of http://opcfoundation.org/UA/Machinery/Jobs/
Collects the data type descriptions of http://opcfoundation.org/UA/Machinery/Jobs/
The default BrowseName for instances of the type.
Defines a read-only set of Equipment Class IDs and Equipment IDs that may be specified in a job order.
Defines a read-only list of job order information available from the server.
Defines a read-only set of Material Classes IDs that may be specified in a job order.
Defines a read-only set of Material Classes IDs that may be specified in a job order.
Defines a read-only set of Personnel IDs and Person IDs that may be specified in a job order.
Defines a read-only set of Physical Asset Class IDs and Physical Asset IDs that may be specified in a job order.
Defines a read-only set of work master IDs that may be specified in a job order, and the read-only set of parameters that may be specified for a specific work master.

uax:Description.uax:Text: Contains an ID of the job order, as specified by the method caller.
Contains information about the execution of a job order, such as the current status of the job, actual material consumed, actual material produced, actual equipment used, and job specific data.
Returns the status of the method execution.

Contains a job status of the JobResponse to be returned. The array shall provide at least one entry representing the top level state and potentially additional entries representing substates. The first entry shall be the top level entry, having the BrowsePath set to null. The order of the substates is not defined.

Contains a list of information about the execution of a job order, such as the current status of the job, actual material consumed, actual material produced, actual equipment used, and job specific data.
Returns the status of the method execution.
